intro.title: The Snow Oath
text: Snow bites your lungs as you step into the courtyard.
Blood is fresh on the stones.
From the dark, someone whispers your name.

callout.title: The Answering Steps
text: Your words vanish into the wind.
Then footsteps answer—slow and certain.
The sound is too calm. Too sure.

stand.title: Silhouette
text: A silhouette steps forward…
A smile glints where a face should be.
You realize too late: it wanted you to answer.

death_cutthroat.title: A Quiet Knife
text: Your hand moves—
but the cold bite in your ribs is faster.
Snow drinks your warmth as the courtyard turns distant.
Some names are whispered only to lure them out.

achievement.title: Fell for the Whisper
achievement.description: You answered the darkness—and it answered back.

search.title: Warm Blood
text: You kneel beside the blood. It’s still warm.
A trail leads toward the stables.
Something was dragged… or carried.

wait.title: Something Watches
text: Minutes pass. The wind hushes.
A shadow crosses the blood—careful not to step in it.
It isn’t a beast. It’s a person trying not to be seen.

death_ambush.title: Steel in the Dark
text: You step out.
The figure doesn’t run.
Behind you—another breath. Another blade.
You chose pride over proof.

achievement.title: Pride Before Proof
achievement.description: You stepped into the open without knowing who else was watching.

follow_silent.title: Footprints Like Thread
text: You move like a whisper behind them.
They slip toward the river path—fast, but not panicked.
They think they’re unseen.

death_river.title: Black Ice
text: You lunge.
They twist—your boots hit slick ice.
The world drops out from under you.
The river takes you without a sound.

achievement.title: Claimed by Black Ice
achievement.description: One reckless step was all the river needed.

trail.title: River Ice
text: The trail ends at the river ice.
A small sack lies half-buried in snow.
There are two sets of prints—one returning to the hall.

sack_open.title: The Crest in Cloth
text: Inside the sack: silver rings, stamped coins, and a torn strip of royal cloth.
A crest—half-hidden—matches the old songs.
This isn’t random blood. It’s a crime worth killing for.

choices.label: Take it and run for the hall

death_shout.title: Wrong Name to Yell
text: Your shout echoes.
Answering it comes a whistle—sharp and practiced.
A bolt finds your throat.
Some halls have ears… and not all of them are loyal.

achievement.title: Raised Your Voice
achievement.description: You called for help—and called the wrong people.

prints_to_hall.title: Back to Warmth
text: The prints lead you back to the hall.
Warmth hits your face like a lie.
Someone inside is pretending nothing happened.

death_hall.title: Too Many Eyes
text: Your voice climbs the rafters.
Chairs scrape. Hands vanish into cloaks.
You realize the room decided your fate before you spoke.

achievement.title: Spoke Too Loud
achievement.description: You challenged the room—and the room answered together.

bench_find.title: A Hidden Seal
text: Under a bench: a wax seal stamped with the same crest.
The mark of a jarl’s treasury.
If you bring this to the right person… you’ll be rewarded.
If you bring it to the wrong one… you’ll be buried.

choices.label: Keep it secret and leave quietly
Show it to the nearest guard

river_observe.title: A Deal in Snow
text: From cover, you watch the figure meet another.
A sack changes hands.
You hear one word clearly: “Crest.”
They leave the sack behind—thinking it empty.

choices.label: Wait until they’re gone, then check the sack

riches_hall.title: A Secret Worth Gold
text: You slip into the hall with the sack hidden under your cloak.
No one notices—because no one looks at the quiet ones.
You know exactly what you have.

riches_road.title: Riches and Fame
text: By dawn, you stand before the right doors—those that pay for silence and proof.
The crest becomes your leverage.
The coins become your start.
And the tale becomes yours: the one who uncovered the blood-trail… and lived.

achievement.title: Blood-Trail Survivor
achievement.description: Uncovered the truth and lived to claim the reward.

hall.title: Inside the Hall
text: The doors slam behind you.
The warmth feels wrong—like a trap dressed as safety.

choices.label: Gather yourself and step back out
